name: Puzzle It Out
description:
Puzzle It Out

Screenshots:

Controls:

W - moves Purple bricks UP

A - moves Beige bricks UP

S - moves Purple bricks Down

D - moves Beige bricks Down

Tab - Pauses the game

T - Hides/Shows  time

R - Restarts level

Music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/  by David Fesliyan ( All  Shall End, The Quiet Morning, Relaxing Green Nature) and David Renda (Vibes).
